dc_title_s: Wastewater Treatment Plants, San Mateo County, 2017
dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents wastewater treatment plants in San Mateo County. Source: Compiled based on Google searches and Pacific Institute Study (Pg. 62): http://pacinst.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/21/2014/04/sea-level-rise.pdf. Acquired: August 2015. Edited: February 2017. Added Daly City WWTP. This layer is part of the San Mateo County Sea Level Rise Vulnerability Assessment Project. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
dc_publisher_s: County of San Mateo Information Services Department
dc_creator_sm: County of San Mateo Information Services Department
